mapper.select: select RNUM ,"CODE", "CATEGORY", "TITLE", "MOJIBSU", "CONTENT" ,"VIEW", "START", "END" ,"TEAMNAME", "SIDO" ,"SIGG", "NICKNAME", "CAREER", "REGDATE" ,"DAY","MEET" from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY fi.REGDATE DESC) AS RNUM ,fi.CODE, fi.CATEGORY, fi.TITLE, fi.MOJIBSU, fi.CONTENT ,fi."VIEW", fi."START", fi."END" ,fi.TEAMNAME, fi.SIDO ,fi.SIGG, fi.NICKNAME, fi.CAREER, fi.REGDATE , fi."DAY", fi.MEET FROM PROJECT_INFO fi where fi."START" >sysdate ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startPage} AND #{endPage} >= RNUM

SELECT "CODE", "CATEGORY", "TITLE", "MOJIBSU", "CONTENT" ,"VIEW", "START", "END" ,"TEAMNAME", "SIDO" ,"SIGG", "NICKNAME", "MEET","CAREER", "REGDATE" , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN("END", "START"), 0) "DAY" ,"MEMCODE" FROM PROJECT_INFO WHERE CODE = #{code}
SELECT ASK.SK_NAME AS "SKILL" FROM TEAM_SKILL TK JOIN ALL_SKILL ASK ON ASK.SK_CODE = TK.TS_SK_CODE WHERE TS_OP_CODE = #{code}
SELECT lastCode FROM ( SELECT LAST_VALUE(OP_CODE) OVER(ORDER BY OP_DATE DESC) AS lastCode FROM OPEN_PROJECT )A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISH(WISH_NO, WISH_DATE, WISH_OP_CODE, WISH_MEM_CODE) VALUES(WISH_SEQ.NEXTVAL,SYSDATE,#{code},#{memCode})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM PROJECT_INFO where "START" >sysdate
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END as count FROM PROJECT_INFO fi WHERE fi."START" > sysdate AND fi.MEMCODE=#{memCode}
